Premium Features

Authentication and User Management

Securely manage access to the platform with Google or Github authentication, or enable single sign-on through any OIDC/SAML2.0 compatible identity provider

Secure

Control automation access the platform via API Tokens, get visibility into activity through our Audit Trail and encrypt sensitive data using our Secrets feature

Advanced API

Pactflow is fully compatible and deeply integrated with all of the foundations open-source tooling

Managed Solution

Pactflow's fully hosted solution means no servers or code to maintain

Developers love Pact

Here what engineers have to say about the problems you can solve using contract-testing and Pact

“Using Pact we have eliminated the need for tightly coupled integration test environments in favour of isolated micro-services that can be tested and deployed independently”

Daniel Oades
Principal Developer In Test, ITV

“It has given our team the confidence to remove the E2E tests we previously had ... we no longer have to rely on other services being available for our pipeline to remain green”

Jemma Wells
Product Engineer at John Lewis & Partners, specialising in Quality Assurance

“Utilizing CDCs has alleviated our problem of API specification drift”

Tanya Heuiser
Lead Software Engineer with Mastercard Loyalty Solutions

“CDC helped us massively in testing service interactions across 100+ microservices, without relying on heavy (and sometimes brittle) full end-to-end environments”

Pierre Vincent
Lead Software Engineer with Mastercard Loyalty Solutions

“Using contract testing has allowed us to ... be in a position to replace expensive end-to-end testing with pact testing”

Oswald Quek
GDS Developer

“They received immediate feedback in their tests when a breaking change was about to be made to the API implementation by validating against our API spec”

James Navin
Principal Developer, Atlassian
